Load the necessary packages, `rvest` for parsing HTML pages, `stringr` for manipulating strings and extracting data from characters, `jsonlite` to parse JSON data, and `dplyr` to manipulate data.

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
```
